ISRCÃ¯Â¼Å¡CN-F27-99-311-00/A.J6

This is Shenzhen Yushchenko in 1999 published folk music collection by eight CD, namely: "Gong Guqin album", "Li Guangzu pipa solo album", "Ren with Cheung suona Instrumental Album", "Xu Ling child zither album "" Dyer flute solo album "," Hua Yanjun (Bing) instrumental music album "," Zhanhao works selections - troubled couple "and" Guo Minqing Dulcimer album. " Some albums have been published in a separate release.
